channel.title: 508 PK Universe Development
channel.description:
Hey guys well Me and Zothuron have been working on this server and it is online for people to have a look at, It is still in development and we would much apperciate your feed back.
There are many features including: custom Shops at Ge. Grand Exchange Basic barrows with random rewards chest GodWars Teleports in Quest area Custom Quests PVP in many players Great Melee PKing Hunting and Herblore great cash making basic Slayer Slayer Castle Range and mage working Dragons have fire breath Working Friends and ignore list yell system basic quick chat Website and HD Webclient at http://pkuniverse.game-server.cc
As i said still in development and would be great to see some of you guys try it out. Give us feed back and have fun
a couple of screenies.
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/21ltkx1.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2u47m1x.jpg[/img]

item.title: 508 PK Universe Development
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

QuestMaster 2K10:

Add better features. The reason I say this is for the simple fact, that you can see these same features on almost every server, so there’s nothing great about your server. Add something other servers don’t, That may make your server a little bit more attractive.

That would be correct. I would advise doing something custom (not items) to the server that most 508 deobs don’t have.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 PK Universe Development
item.dc:creator: @vahshir vahshir
item.description:
@vahshir wrote:

Hey guys well Me and Zothuron have been working on this server and it is online for people to have a look at, It is still in development and we would much apperciate your feed back.

There are many features including:
custom Shops at Ge.
Grand Exchange
Basic barrows with random rewards chest
GodWars
Teleports in Quest area
Custom Quests
PVP in many players
Great Melee PKing
Hunting and Herblore great cash making
basic Slayer
Slayer Castle
Range and mage working
Dragons have fire breath
Working Friends and ignore list
yell system
basic quick chat
Website and HD Webclient at http://pkuniverse.game-server.cc

As i said still in development and would be great to see some of you guys try it out.
Give us feed back and have fun
